00064   static string getOutputExt(Params & params){
00065     string outputExt, outputFileType=params.frame.outputFileType;
00066     if(outputFileType == "xml")
00067       outputExt=params.extensions.xml;
00068     else if(outputFileType == "analyze")
00069       outputExt=params.extensions.analyze;
00070     else if(outputFileType =="raw")
00071       outputExt=params.extensions.raw;
00072     else if(outputFileType =="dcm")
00073       outputExt=params.extensions.dicom;
00074     else if(outputFileType =="hdr")
00075       outputExt=params.extensions.interfile;
00076     else
00077       outputExt=params.extensions.xml;
00078     return outputExt;
00079   };
00085   static OFF_T  getFileLength(FILE * pFile)
00086   {
00087     fseeko(pFile, 0, SEEK_END);
00088     OFF_T length = ftello(pFile);
00089     return length;
00090   };
00095   static void logError(string msg)

00106   static void cleanUp(int errorCode)
00107   {
00108     Status *status = Status::getStatus();
00109     stringstream errString;
00110     errString<<"Failure, error code "<<errorCode
00111                            <<", view log.";
00112     status->update(errString.str(), Status::ERROR);
00113     cout.flush();
00114     cerr.flush();
00115     MPI::COMM_WORLD.Abort(errorCode);
00116   };
00120   static void setTm(tm &tmTime , string years, string months, string days,
00121              string hours, string minutes, string seconds)
00122   {
00123     tmTime.tm_sec = atoi(seconds.c_str())-1;
00124     tmTime.tm_min = atoi(minutes.c_str())-1;
00125     tmTime.tm_hour = atoi(hours.c_str())-1;
00126     tmTime.tm_mday = atoi(days.c_str());
00127     tmTime.tm_mon = atoi(months.c_str())-1;
00128     tmTime.tm_year = atoi(years.c_str())-1900;
00129     tmTime.tm_zone = "EST";
00130     tmTime.tm_isdst = 0;
00131   };

00141   static string trim(string str) {
00142      // trim leading whitespace
00143      string::size_type  notwhite = str.find_first_not_of(" \t\n");
00144      str.erase(0,notwhite);
00145 
00146      // trim trailing whitespace
00147      notwhite = str.find_last_not_of(" \t\n");
00148      str.erase(notwhite+1);
00149      return str;
00150 }
